short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to remove 'disabled' attribute from input and modify input value.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Disabled - What is it? No Disabled is an extension for lazy people that allows you to directly enter the code from a link like https://hsr.hoyoverse.com/gift?code=. It does the necessary actions on the website to enable entering the code directly from the link without having to manually type it in. The icon used in the extension is sourced from Disabled icon by Icons8. This extension does not collect any data or information other than the code contained in the URL. I admit that ChatGPT helped me with certain points.
